root.name: Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games
root.description: GameplayWii One of the new events in the Wii version, Dream Ice Hockey. The Wii version of the game features various co-op and competitive modes, including boss battles and Festival Mode. Festival Mode allows the player(s) to play through an Olympic competition from opening to closing ceremony. The game offers Wii Balance Board support. DS The DS version of the game offers Adventure Tour mode, in which the player tries to stop Dr. Eggman and Bowser from ruining the Olympic Games.
